fields.description: The type of the FHIR resource.
fields.name: resourceType

fields.description: The logical id of the resource to update.
fields.name: id
fields.note: The id value must match the AllergyIntolerance/<id> value.

fields.description: Contained, inline Resources.
fields.name: contained
fields.note: These should be either Practitioner or RelatedPerson resources that are referenced with the reporter field.

fields.description: Date(/time) when manifestations showed.
fields.name: onset

fields.description: When the sensitivity was recorded.
fields.name: recordedDate

fields.description: Who recorded the sensitivity.
fields.name: recorder
fields.note: Recorder must be a Practitioner reference.

fields.description: Who the sensitivity is for.
fields.name: patient

fields.description: Source of the information about the allergy.
fields.name: reporter
fields.note: If reporter is a contained reference, a matching RelatedPerson or Practitioner reference must be provided in the contained field.

binding.description: Type of the substance and negation codes for reporting no known allergies.

terminology.note: SNOMED CT is supported for non-medication substances and for negations.

fields.description: Substance, (or class) considered to be responsible for risk
fields.name: substance

fields.description: Assertion about certainty associated with the propensity, or potential risk, of a reaction to the identified substance.
fields.name: status

fields.description: Estimate of the potential clinical harm, or seriousness, of the reaction to the identified substance.
fields.name: criticality

fields.description: Identification of the underlying physiological mechanism for the reaction risk.
fields.name: type

fields.description: Category of the identified substance.
fields.name: category

fields.description: Additional text not captured in other fields.
fields.name: note

fields.description: Individual responsible for the annotation.
fields.name: note.authorReference

fields.description: When the annotation was made.
fields.name: note.time

fields.description: The text content.
fields.name: note.text

fields.description: Adverse reaction events linked to exposure to substance.
fields.name: reaction

fields.description: Logical id of the reaction event.
fields.name: reaction.id

binding.description: Clinical symptoms and/or signs that are observed or associated with an adverse reaction event.

fields.description: Clinical symptoms/signs associated with the event.
fields.name: reaction.manifestation
